docs.title: let's Go! REST API lambda
docs.text: Here it is my first post, let's set up our development env.

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
Let's go to the offical web site to install go in our computer and follow the instruction. Download and install

I am istalling in it in MacOs and I will be using brew.

brew install go
.
.
.
>go version 
go version go1.23.4 darwin/arm64

docs.title: Create a project
docs.text:
Go to your project folder. I like to have mine under my personal directory (mkdir ~/projects/go)

// create folder

mkdir first

// change directory

cd first

// init your project

go mod init first

// create a new file

touch first.go

// add the code

package main

import (
    "fmt"
)

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, world!")
}
// run your code
go run .
Hello, world!
